name: Ball Rush (Elijvh, AlexanderPhillips, PropellorHat, NotAGoldfish)
description:
Game Description

Ball Rush is a free to play casual arcade mobile game where you sling yourself upwards; collecting points, dodging obstacles and traversing changing environments.

PRESSKIT: https://lab5perth.wixsite.com/home/presski

Download Recommendations & Instructions:

It is recommended to download version BallRush1.1.apk 

However, if this version slow and you are experiencing frame rate drops then please uninstall the previous version and download BallRush1.1LowQual.apk

The apk is build for android devices. The installation will be different if you based on if you are downloading the apk from a PC or the android device you will play from. 

Here is a link to some simple instructions to download: 

https://www.nextpit.com/android-for-beginners-what-is-an-apk-file
